document.full_text: italy's defense of their fed cup crown fell by the wayside against russia on sunday prompting roberta vinci to criticize compatriots francesca schiavone and flavia pennetta for withdrawing from the team.
document.title: vinci blasts absent players after italy fed loss
lines_and_colors: italy's defense of their fed cup crown fell by the wayside against russia on sunday prompting roberta vinci to criticize compatriots francesca schiavone and flavia pennetta for withdrawing from the team.
